title: i haven't get any chests in a while

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: my problem is i'm getting a lot of s- or higher while playing games (mostly solo q ranked) but i'm not earning any chests even though i have my available  4 chests to earn (as u can see in the link i added) and it's been like this for a while now

replies.body: It looks like from your match history you've been playing a steady stream of Leona. Keep in mind that you can only get [**one chest per champ per season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
